setDomaRankOracle(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params._oracleAddress: The address of the DomaRank oracle contract

params._feedAddress: The address of the DIA AggregatorV3Interface adapter for this token.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token (e.g., USDT, USDC).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows borrower to add additional collateral to an active loan

calculateCurrentInterest(uint256).notice: Calculates the current interest for an active loan

calculateTotalRepayment(uint256).notice: Calculates the total repayment amount for an active loan

cancelLoanOffer(uint256).notice: Cancels a pending loan offer and returns funds to lender

checkDomainLockStatus(uint256,address).notice: Check domain lock status for compliance (future feature)

createLoanOffer(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Creates a new loan offer with default oracle parameters (for testing/simple use)
Creates a new loan offer with custom oracle parameters

filterDomaBackedLoans(uint256[]).notice: Get all Doma-backed loan IDs from an array of loan IDs

getActiveLoanOffers().notice: Returns all active loan offer IDs

getActiveLoanOffersCount().notice: Returns the total count of active loan offers

getActiveLoanOffersPaginated(uint256,uin.notice: Returns paginated active loan offer IDs

getBorrowerLoans(address).notice: Gets all loan IDs for a borrower

getBorrowerLoansCount(address).notice: Returns the total count of loans for a borrower

getBorrowerLoansPaginated(address,uint25.notice: Gets paginated loan IDs for a borrower

getDomainTokenId(uint256).notice: Get the domain token ID for a Doma-backed loan

getLenderLoans(address).notice: Gets all loan IDs for a lender

getLenderLoansCount(address).notice: Returns the total count of loans for a lender

getLenderLoansPaginated(address,uint256,.notice: Gets paginated loan IDs for a lender

getLoanHealthFactor(uint256).notice: Gets the current health factor (collateralization ratio) of an active loan.

getLoanRepaymentInfo(uint256).notice: Gets detailed repayment information for an active loan

getRecommendedParameters(address,address.notice: Get recommended collateral parameters for a loan asset and collateral asset pair

getSupportedTokens().notice: Get all supported tokens for lending

isDomaBackedLoan(uint256).notice: Check if a loan uses Doma fractional token as collateral

isLoanDefaulted(uint256).notice: Checks if a loan has defaulted (past due date or undercollateralized)

isLoanPairSupported(address,address).notice: Check if both tokens in a loan pair are supported

liquidateLoan(uint256).notice: Liquidates a defaulted loan (can be called by anyone after default)

makePartialRepayment(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows borrower to make a partial repayment on an active loan

removeCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows borrower to remove collateral from an active loan (if health factor allows)

setDomaRankOracle(address).notice: Sets the DomaRank oracle address for fractional token valuations

setTokenPriceFeed(address,address).notice: Sets the price feed contract for a given ERC20 token.
